AI-driven diary analyzing emotions and generating reflective writing.

- Built an AI diary that analyzes emotions and generates reflective writing\n- Node.js backend with JWT, bcrypt, Helmet; SQLite for storage\n- CI/CD with GitHub Actions; deployed from Vercel to AWS EC2
Travel planner with Dijkstra-based routing and payments.

- Implemented Dijkstra-based route optimization with weighted preferences\n- Integrated Kakao Maps API for visualization and PayApp for payments\n- Firebase for authentication and data; JavaScript frontend
Low-level C projects reimplementing core standard library features.

- Own library to replace libc functions
- Custom implementation of printf
- Line reader from text file until EOF
- Sorting algorithm for a set of integers
